result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Clarissa A Johnson

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on November 9, 2022 at 09:30 am.

09:24 AM Defendant Clarissa A Johnson not in court.  Alexander Paul Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews file, defendant is in a treatment facility, was given notice to be here or called to get Zoom information. State - requests bench warrant body or $500.00. Court so orders. Recalled at 9:38 AM. Clerk informs Court of the message they received from the defendant that she is no longer in treatment and stated that she did not have a ride for Court today, bench warrant continues, defendant has been advised of the warrant,
Adjourned initial appearance on April 27, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Must sign and return with in 10 days.

09:21 AM Defendant Clarissa A Johnson appears by video.  Alexander Paul Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Johnson has received a copy of the complaint. Court reads charge and penatly. Johnson understands. Court questions if she has contacted an attorney. Johnson has contacted a private attorney. Court will have set for AIA. State asks for $500 signature bond. Court sets $500 signature bond, must sign and return within 10 days. Johnson asks for bond to be sent to Rogers Behavioral Center at 34700 Valley Road, Ocontomowac, WI 53066. AIA scheduled for 4/27/22 at 9:15 AM.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 09:15 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Clarissa A Johnson
Current: 5032 Devil's Lake Lane, Crandon, WI 54520 United States  (Effective: 04-05-2022)
Prior: 2233 S 63rd Street, West Allis, WI 53215
Initial appearance on April 5, 2022 at 09:15 am.
